summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding proofreading and cite-checking a bail appeal brief in the Epstein case. The sender provides editing notes and mentions being offline for the afternoon.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is proofreading and cite-checking a bail appeal brief, and mentions having to be offline.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney was proofreading a bail appeal brief related to the Epstein case on May 27, 2021.
The attorney cite-checked paragraph 32 of the brief and provided editing notes.
The email indicates ongoing legal work on an appeal in the Epstein case as of 2021.
